link.title: Sim-to-Real Transfer
link.description: Bridge the reality gap. Learn domain randomization, reality gap analysis, and techniques to transfer robot behaviors from simulation to physical robots.

learningObjectives: Understand the Sim-to-Real gap and its causes
Implement domain randomization for robust training
Export trained models for edge deployment
Flash and configure NVIDIA Jetson for inference
Validate simulation-trained behaviors on real sensors
